command: until wget --spider -q release-name-signoz-query-service:8080/api/v1/health?live=1; do echo -e "waiting for query-service"; sleep 5; done; echo -e "query-service ready, starting frontend now";
initContainers.name: release-name-signoz-frontend-init

command: echo "ruok" | timeout 2 nc -w 2 localhost 2181 | grep imok
echo "ruok" | timeout 2 nc -w 2 localhost 2181 | grep imok

until wget --user "$(CLICKHOUSE_USER):$(CLICKHOUSE_PASSWORD)" --spider -q release-name-clickhouse:8123/ping; do echo -e "waiting for clickhouseDB"; sleep 5; done; echo -e "clickhouse ready, starting schema migrator now";
initContainers.name: release-name-signoz-schema-migrator-init

command:
echo "Running clickhouse ready check"
while true
do
  version="$(CLICKHOUSE_VERSION)"
  shards="$(CLICKHOUSE_SHARDS)"
  replicas="$(CLICKHOUSE_REPLICAS)"
  current_version="$(clickhouse client --host ${CLICKHOUSE_HOST} --port ${CLICKHOUSE_PORT} --user "${CLICKHOUSE_USER}" --password "${CLICKHOUSE_PASSWORD}" -q "SELECT version()")"
  if [ -z "$current_version" ]; then
    echo "waiting for clickhouse to be ready"
    sleep 5
    continue
  fi
  if [ -z "$(echo "$current_version" | grep "$version")" ]; then
    echo "expected version: $version, current version: $current_version"
    echo "waiting for clickhouse with correct version"
    sleep 5
    continue
  fi
  current_shards="$(clickhouse client --host ${CLICKHOUSE_HOST} --port ${CLICKHOUSE_PORT} --user "${CLICKHOUSE_USER}" --password "${CLICKHOUSE_PASSWORD}" -q "SELECT count(DISTINCT(shard_num)) FROM system.clusters WHERE cluster = '${CLICKHOUSE_CLUSTER}'")"
  if [ -z "$current_shards" ]; then
    echo "waiting for clickhouse to be ready"
    sleep 5
    continue
  fi
  if [ "$current_shards" -ne "$shards" ]; then
    echo "expected shard count: $shards, current shard count: $current_shards"
    echo "waiting for clickhouse with correct shard count"
    sleep 5
    continue
  fi
  current_replicas="$(clickhouse client --host ${CLICKHOUSE_HOST} --port ${CLICKHOUSE_PORT} --user "${CLICKHOUSE_USER}" --password "${CLICKHOUSE_PASSWORD}" -q "SELECT count(DISTINCT(replica_num)) FROM system.clusters WHERE cluster = '${CLICKHOUSE_CLUSTER}'")"
  if [ -z "$current_replicas" ]; then
    echo "waiting for clickhouse to be ready"
    sleep 5
    continue
  fi
  if [ "$current_replicas" -ne "$replicas" ]; then
    echo "expected replica count: $replicas, current replica count: $current_replicas"
    echo "waiting for clickhouse with correct replica count"
    sleep 5
    continue
  fi
  break
done
echo "clickhouse ready, starting schema migrator now"
initContainers.name: release-name-signoz-schema-migrator-ch-ready

command: until wget --user "${CLICKHOUSE_USER}:${CLICKHOUSE_PASSWORD}" --spider -q release-name-clickhouse:8123/ping; do echo -e "waiting for clickhouseDB"; sleep 5; done; echo -e "clickhouse ready, starting query service now";
initContainers.name: release-name-signoz-query-service-init

command: until wget --spider -q release-name-signoz-query-service:8080/api/v1/health?live=1; do echo -e "waiting for query-service"; sleep 5; done; echo -e "query-service ready, starting alertmanager now";
initContainers.name: release-name-signoz-alertmanager-init
